title: St Ettiene v Manchester United LIVE: Follow the minute-by-minute Europa League action
text: St Ettiene v Manchester United LIVE: Follow the minute-by-minute Europa League action EXPRESS SPORT brings you live coverage of Manchester United against St Etienne - follow it here. PUBLISHED: 15:53, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 | UPDATED: 15:58, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 Manchester United face French side St Etienne in the Europa League last-32 United are in France for the second leg after winning the first 3-0 Jose Mourinho has left Wayne Rooney and Luke Shaw behind
